message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product that I think you'll really appreciate. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $18000 to make it worth my while. What do you think?

I'm still very interested in the product, but I really think $18000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'd like to propose $14000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm starting to think you really want this product. I can see you're willing to meet me halfway from your previous offer, but I still need to make a decent profit. I'm willing to compromise further, so I'll meet you halfway from my previous counteroffer. I'm thinking $16500. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd like to propose $14500. I think this is a fair price that works for both of us, and I'm willing to commit to the purchase if you can meet me at this price.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm starting to think we're close to a deal. I can see you're willing to stretch your budget, and I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous counteroffer. I'll meet you at $16000. What do you think?
I think we're really close, Alice! I'm willing to meet you at $15500. I'm stretching my budget as far as I can, and I'd love to make a deal with you. Can you meet me at this price?
